targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%ssh_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%http_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%https_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%mysql_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT
  $__time(date),
  (data->>'dst_port')::int as port,
  (data->>'src_ip')
FROM
  sniffer_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) and data->>'action' LIKE '%tcpscan%' and (data->>'src_ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT data->>'src_ip' as ip,
       data->>'raw_payload' as payload
FROM   sniffer_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'action' LIKE '%tcppayload%' AND (data->>'src_ip') LIKE '%$IP%'
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%ftp_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%smtp_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%pop3_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%postgres_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT data->>'src_ip' as ip,
       data->>'ICMP_MSG' as payload
FROM   sniffer_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'action' LIKE '%icmp%' AND (data->>'src_ip') LIKE '%$IP%'
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%vnc_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%telnet_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%socks5_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%redis_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT data->>'ip' as ip,
       data->>'payload' as payload
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%dns_server%' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%rdp_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%mssql_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%smb_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%elastic_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT
  $__time(date),
  (data->>'bytes_sent')::int as bytes_sent,
  (data->>'bytes_recv')::int as bytes_recv,
  (data->>'packets_sent')::int as packets_sent,
  (data->>'packets_recv')::int as packets_recv
FROM
  system_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)

SELECT count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%success%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS success,
       count(id) filter (WHERE data->>'status' LIKE '%failed%' AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%') AS failed
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%ldap_server%' AND data->>'status'  <> '' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'

SELECT data->>'ip' as ip,
       data->>'payload' as payload
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'server' LIKE '%http_proxy_server%' AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT data->>'ip' as ip,
       data->>'username' as username,
       data->>'password' as password,
       data->>'server' as server
FROM   servers_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'action' LIKE '%login%' AND data->>'ip' <> ''  AND (data->>'ip') LIKE '%$IP%'
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT
  $__time(date),
  (data->'QBSniffer'->>'memory')::float as sniffer,
  (data->'QFTPServer'->>'memory')::float as ftp,
  (data->'QDNSServer'->>'memory')::float as dns,
  (data->'QHTTPServer'->>'memory')::float as http,
  (data->'QHTTPSServer'->>'memory')::float as https,
  (data->'QHTTPProxyServer'->>'memory')::float as httpproxy,
  (data->'QTPOP3Server'->>'memory')::float as pop3,
  (data->'QIMAPServer'->>'memory')::float as imap,
  (data->'QRDPServer'->>'memory')::float as rdp,
  (data->'QSMBServer'->>'memory')::float as smb,
  (data->'QSMTPServer'->>'memory')::float as smtp,
  (data->'QVNCServer'->>'memory')::float as vnc,
  (data->'QSSHServer'->>'memory')::float as ssh,
  (data->'QSOCKS5Server'->>'memory')::float as socks5,
  (data->'QTelnetServer'->>'memory')::float as telnet,
  (data->'QRedisServer'->>'memory')::float as redis,
  (data->'QMysqlServer'->>'memory')::float as mysql,
  (data->'QPostgresServer'->>'memory')::float as postgres,
  (data->'QLDAPServer'->>'memory')::float as ldap
FROM
  system_table
  system_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)

SELECT data->>'ip' as ip,
       data->>'raw_payload' as payload
FROM   sniffer_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'action' LIKE '%udppayload%' AND (data->>'src_ip') LIKE '%$IP%'
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT data->>'payload' as payload
FROM   sniffer_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'action' LIKE '%creds_check%' AND data->>'payload' <> ''
ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT
  $__time(date),
  (data->'QBSniffer'->>'cpu')::float as sniffer,
  (data->'QFTPServer'->>'cpu')::float as ftp,
  (data->'QDNSServer'->>'cpu')::float as dns,
  (data->'QHTTPServer'->>'cpu')::float as http,
  (data->'QHTTPSServer'->>'cpu')::float as https,
  (data->'QHTTPProxyServer'->>'cpu')::float as httpproxy,
  (data->'QTPOP3Server'->>'cpu')::float as pop3,
  (data->'QIMAPServer'->>'cpu')::float as imap,
  (data->'QRDPServer'->>'cpu')::float as rdp,
  (data->'QSMBServer'->>'cpu')::float as smb,
  (data->'QSMTPServer'->>'cpu')::float as smtp,
  (data->'QVNCServer'->>'cpu')::float as vnc,
  (data->'QSSHServer'->>'cpu')::float as ssh,
  (data->'QSOCKS5Server'->>'cpu')::float as socks5,
  (data->'QTelnetServer'->>'cpu')::float as telnet,
  (data->'QRedisServer'->>'cpu')::float as redis,
  (data->'QMysqlServer'->>'cpu')::float as mysql,
  (data->'QPostgresServer'->>'cpu')::float as postgres,
  (data->'QLDAPServer'->>'cpu')::float as ldap
FROM
  system_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)

SELECT $__time(date),
       data->>'type' as type
FROM   errors_table
WHERE  $__timeFilter(date) AND data->>'type' <> ''
